author: Michelle Fay Cortez
title: Who Would Have Predicted This? Americans Excel at Staying Home
description: An estimated 90% of citizens have complied with social distancing guidelines
content:
An elementary school teacher meets with her first-grade students on Google Meet from her home in Brookline, Massachusetts on March 27. 
Americans, it turns out, are excellent at following social-distance and stay-at-home orders.
It’s an unexpected finding. … [+5078 chars]
